extendedInfo.description: Let your kids explore the sounds of the animal kingdom with this simple and free Android app!Listen to the sounds of 20 animals and save them as Ringtones, Alarms or Notifications.Keep your kids engaged while learning.  Just touch and listen!100% Free!

reviews.title: Supreme Application
reviews.comment: Application is one of the best application ever I found. Sound quality is nice. Perfectly suit for Alarm or ringtone in any Android phone. \\m/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kids just love it ..
reviews.comment: Great apps! My kids just love it. Very informative, entertaining and educational too. Looking forward for more apps like this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Animal sound app
reviews.comment: Its Good Animal sound application.i have tried many similar apps but in this app Animal sounds looks like somehow different and original one.I must say that the one who likes animal sounds should try this application!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: MY 2 YEAR OLD LOVE IT!
reviews.comment: My 2 year old has been playing with it all afternoon. He is mimicking the sounds its so cute.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mind blowing sounds
reviews.comment: Good application ever a child can love these sounds.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So sweet app
reviews.comment: I babysit 1.5 year old boy and he loves animal sounds more than anything. He is absolutely crazy about this app. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Me and my son love this. He enjoys the sound which sounded real. I use this to teach him animal sounds while having fun. Plus he gets to see their pic
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love It!!
reviews.comment: My kids love this app SO MUCH!! I have trouble borrowing my own phone from kids because of this hahahaha!! Wish to have more of this in the future.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: I was looking for a soundboard of animal noises for my preschool class and found this app. It is perfect, thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for kids.
reviews.comment: Great app! There are a good amount of animal, sound effects are great!! Would def pay for a bigger app!!! Thank you 10000 times.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cute!
reviews.comment: Fun to let the kids help pick a different animal ringtone for each person in the family! Does exactly what it says - simple and straight to the point.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: love this app.
reviews.comment: Great for my kids. Keeps them entertained for hours.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is so real
reviews.comment: Thanks for this application, sounds are so real, my kid love it. This application is great for education for small kids. Thanks again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome animal sounds for my kid
reviews.comment: My 17 month old boy is starting to learn how to imitate animal sounds and he loves this app. 5 stars, 10 if I could! Must have app if you have kids!

reviews.comment: I have downloaded many similar apps, that I\'ve actually paid for, and this one is far the best! And it is FREE!
